document_data.name: Sapphire House
document_data.mainbody: '''Sapphire House''' was an expensive rooming house on [[Swords Street]] in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] on the opposite side of the street to [[Blackstaff Tower]].
document_data.Structure: The inn was a five-story building.
